value.name: Wife’s 911 call played at review of man’s shooting death by police
value.description: Police were called to Jeffrey Hubbard’s Las Vegas home twice in the months leading up to the August day when officers shot and killed the 67-year-old man, who pointed a gun at police during what ...

value.name: Clark County officials hold review surrounding death of Jeffrey Hubbard
value.description: Clark County officials will be holding a fact-finding review to look into the circumstances surrounding the death of Jeffrey Hubbard. Hubbard was shot and killed by Las Vegas police last August ...

value.name: Clark County officials hold review surrounding death of Jeffrey Hubbard
value.description: Clark County officials will be holding a fact-finding review to look into the circumstances surrounding the death of Jeffrey Hubbard. Hubbard was shot and killed by LVMPD last August after his wife called 911 saying he was having a mental health crisis.
